haReport:
This mission was flown by:
Ltn Patrik Schorner
Ltn Harald Bronstein
Fw Ralf Schulz
Fw Gunther Huwyler

 The mission was flown from Bonneuil Ferme aerodrome.

Successes include the following: 
On 10/05/1916 near City(f) Bonneuil Ferme.
A Airco D.H.2 of No 24 Company RFC was brought down by Patrik Schorner of Jasta 4.
Andrew Allard was killed in action.
Patrik Schorner was  flying a Fokker E.III.

On 10/05/1916 near City(f) Bonneuil Ferme.
A Airco D.H.2 of No 24 Company RFC was brought down by Gunther Huwyler of Jasta 4.
Michael Ellis was killed in action.
Gunther Huwyler was  flying a Fokker E.III.
narrative: My first mission in a scout and a vctory is acheived!  A wonderful start.  FOur of us on patrol set upon two British pusher scouts flying over our lines.  It is not a fair fight.  We start with the advantage of altitude and I am determined to maintain it.  Over time the British scouts are forced lower until the fight is on the deck.  I get a firm shot in at the all tan DH2.  I fire into the cockpit and the plane spins and crashes, a sure sign that the pilot was mortally hit.  I turn onthe otherand fire into him.  Huwyler finishes the job.  Both British pilots were, unfortunately, killed.
